SELECT T1.LIST_NO, CASE T1.STATUS WHEN 0 THEN '未执行' WHEN 1 THEN '出库中' WHEN 2 THEN '已完成' WHEN 3 THEN '已取消' END AS STATUS, CASE T1.SOURCE_BY WHEN '1' THEN 'WMS' WHEN '2' THEN 'MES' WHEN '3' THEN 'WCS' END AS SOURCE_BY, T1.CREATION_DATE, T1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, CASE T1.SLMS_FLAG WHEN 1 THEN '新增' WHEN 2 THEN '修改' WHEN 3 THEN '删除' WHEN 0 THEN '复位' END AS SLMS_FLAG, T2.LINE_ID, T2.MATER_NO, T2.GRADE, T2.REQUIRE_QTY, T2.ACT_QTY, T2.SHIP_QTY, T2.PRODUCT_GUID, CASE T2.STATUS WHEN 0 THEN '未执行' WHEN 1 THEN '发货中' WHEN 2 THEN '已完成' END AS LINE_STATUS, T2.STOP_FLAG, T2.DLOC_NO, T2.ERR_FLAG, T2.REMARKS, CASE T2.SLMS_FLAG WHEN 1 THEN '新增' WHEN 2 THEN '修改' WHEN 3 THEN '删除' WHEN 0 THEN '复位' END AS LINE_SLMS_FLAG, T2.EQUIPMENT_NAME, T2.BATCH_NO, T2.REQUEST_CATEGORY, T2.MES_STATUS, T2.EQU_STATUS FROM VIEW_ORDER_LIST T1 INNER JOIN VIEW_ORDER_DTL T2 ON T1.LIST_NO = T2.LIST_NO
T1.LIST_NO LIKE '%'||#where.LIST_NO#||'%'
T2.MATER_NO LIKE '%'||#where.MATER_NO#||'%'
T2.DLOC_NO LIKE '%'||#where.DLOC_NO#||'%'
T2.EQUIPMENT_NAME LIKE '%'||#where.EQUIPMENT_NAME#||'%'
T2.REQUEST_CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#where.REQUEST_CATEGORY#||'%'
T1.CREATION_DATE >= #where.START_TIME#
T1.CREATION_DATE < #where.END_TIME# + 1
ORDER BY t1.creation_date desc

SELECT T1.LIST_NO, CASE T1.STATUS WHEN 0 THEN '未执行' WHEN 1 THEN '出库中' WHEN 2 THEN '已完成' WHEN 3 THEN '已取消' END AS STATUS, CASE T1.SOURCE_BY WHEN '1' THEN 'WMS' WHEN '2' THEN 'MES' WHEN '3' THEN 'WCS' END AS SOURCE_BY, T1.CREATION_DATE, T1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, CASE T1.SLMS_FLAG WHEN 1 THEN '新增' WHEN 2 THEN '修改' WHEN 3 THEN '删除' WHEN 0 THEN '复位' END AS SLMS_FLAG, T2.LINE_ID, T2.MATER_NO, T2.GRADE, T2.REQUIRE_QTY, T2.ACT_QTY, T2.SHIP_QTY, T2.PRODUCT_GUID, CASE T2.STATUS WHEN 0 THEN '未执行' WHEN 1 THEN '发货中' WHEN 2 THEN '已完成' END AS LINE_STATUS, T2.STOP_FLAG, T2.DLOC_NO, T2.ERR_FLAG, T2.REMARKS, CASE T2.SLMS_FLAG WHEN 1 THEN '新增' WHEN 2 THEN '修改' WHEN 3 THEN '删除' WHEN 0 THEN '复位' END AS LINE_SLMS_FLAG, T2.EQUIPMENT_NAME, T2.BATCH_NO, T2.REQUEST_CATEGORY, T2.MES_STATUS, T2.EQU_STATUS FROM VIEW_ORDER_LIST T1 INNER JOIN VIEW_ORDER_DTL T2 ON T1.LIST_NO = T2.LIST_NO
T1.LIST_NO = #where.LIST_NO#
